text: The district of Frutigen in the Swiss canton of Bern has 7 municipalities in an area of 489 km². Municipality Population (Jan 2005) Area (km²) Adelboden 3,686 88.2 Aeschi bei Spiez 1,967 30.9 Frutigen 6,648 71.8 Kandergrund 1,092 32.0 Kandersteg 1,193 134.5 Krattigen 916 6.0 Reichenbach im Kandertal 3,342 125.8 Category:Former districts of Bern
title: Frutigen District
